trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Delaware
There were no other sightings in Delaware on or around September 14th 2009
Summary: Silent hovering white strobed craft over South Delaware area doing zigzag and circular patterns in sky for 90 minutes plus
divs: sighting detailsnearby dog barking awoke me from deep sleep at approximately 4:15 am, sept 14, 2009. looked out of ground floor bedroom window which faced south toward our dog kennel and saw quick strobe flashing white light. appeared to be a couple of miles away. 1 1\2 to 3 miles away. which would put it just over south delaware. i am along the scioto river just west of delaware. strobe light caught my attention. there was an occasional red light and i just assumed it to be a small aircraft. what seemed curious to me was the complete lack of sound and irratic movement unlike plane or helicopter. object appeared to be 1500 - 2000 feet in the air and kept my attention because it bobbed up and down at that altitude staying in the same general area while always moving a bit but in a completely irratic manner including zigzagging, drifing up and down, to the left, to the right, sometimes having a red light, sometimes not. sometimes bright, sometimes not. much higher than a police helicopter looking for something or someone. and again without any attendant sound. it stayed in the same area for 90 minutes just while i happened to be awake watching it. i was feeling after a few minutes like i was watching something i had never seen before. the sky is pretty dark here in the ostrander area between delaware and marysville and it is always interesting to look at the sky with or without the possibility of ufos. this object was different in that there was no flight path from one location to another. it was above the height of a typical helicopter but below the height of a commercial aircraft and had a very uncharacteristic bobbing and zigzagging drifting motion all in the same general area just not going anywhere. it appeared to have a motion most similar to a fishing bobber in choppy waves only in slow motion. i left in the van at 5:40-5:45 am to find what the object was hovering over and found it impossible to keep sight of object and drive at the same time. it was just gone when i looked up after driving for a minute. i did not see it exit. i contacted delaware airport and they said they were unaware of any aircraft in the area. osu airport director said they had no transponder communication from any aircraft in that area at that time. port columbus said that during that time there were only a couple of commercial flyovers.
